component_text: V, S, M (mercury and phosphorous, plus powdered diamond and opal worth a total of 1,000 gp)
level_text: Cleric: 4; Oracle: 4; Warpriest: 4; Sorcerer: 4; Wizard: 4; Arcanist: 4; Witch: 4

components.text: mercury and phosphorous, plus powdered diamond and opal worth a total of 1,000 gp

sections.body:
Will negates; Spell Resistance yes

This spell functions as symbol of death, except all creatures within 60 feet of a symbol of slowing are slowed (as the slow spell) for 1 round per caster level.

Symbol of slowing can be made permanent with a permanency spell by a caster of 11th level or higher for the cost of 10,000 gp.
sections.name: Saving Throw

name: Symbol Of Slowing
